recommendations.item_metadata: [{"category":["CDs & Vinyl","Dance & Electronic","Ambient"],"description":["<I>Spanners<\/I> takes the dense polyrhythms and complex melodies that Black Dog explored on <I><a href=\"\/exec\/obidos\/ASIN\/B000003RG0\/${0}\">Bytes<\/a><\/I> and builds an engaging and endlessly listenable sonic maze for your enjoyment. At times it's a straightforward techno album, but in true Discordian fashion the styles are random and slippery; the 12 tracks, held together by short musical \"Bolts,\" bob and weave through Latin, Arabesque, and even country styles, ensuring a surprise around every corner. Unfortunately, the Black Dog split up shortly after this album's release, with Ken Downie continuing the madness with a series of decidedly unmemorable albums, and Ed Handey and Andy Turner moving on to create further gems as Plaid. But their legacy remains: <I>Spanners<\/I> is an album for which the term \"eclectic\" doesn't quite do. It's simply a masterpiece. <I>--Matthew Corwine<\/I>"],"title":"Spanners","brand":"Black Dog","rank":"318,084 in CDs & Vinyl (","asin":"B000002HJ0","imageURLHighRes":["https:\/\/images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com\/images\/I\/61fQo69WG5L.jpg"],"details":{"Audio CD":"(April 25, 1995)","Number of Discs:":"1","Label:":"Elektra \/ Wea","ASIN:":"B000002HJ0"}}]

[{"category":["CDs & Vinyl","Classical","Chamber Music"],"description":["Corresponding with Trio Mediaeval's tenth anniversary, their fourth ECM album is a powerful and compelling recording of Norwegian folk songs. Performed in concert over the years, these songs are always received ecstatically - this is the album that Trio Mediaeval's fans have been waiting for. The infectious melodies and haunting harmonies of this music will communicate across categories to a very broad listenership. Joining the trio on several selections is percussionist Birger Mistereggen, a specialist in the Norwegian folk drumming tradition. The inclusion of percussion not only widens the sonic spectrum of the group, but also adds a rhythmic element to these ballads, hymns, psalms, love songs and lullabies. Founded in Oslo in 1997, the Norwegian- Swedish vocal group Trio Mediaeval was taken up the following year as protgs of the Hilliard Ensemble. Hilliard tenor singer John Potter was especially excited by their potential and brought the group to ECM, acting as producer or coproducer on each of their New Series discs, Words of the Angel, Soir, dit-elle and Stella Maris. Each of these recordings has had great success with fans and critics alike and the trio has maintained a consistent touring presence in the US and all over the world.","FOLK SONGS Trio Mediaeval (ECM New Series). This wonderful trio of Scandinavian women, based in Oslo, has long tantalized audiences with samplings of Norwegian folk songs. Here, at last, is a full helping, infectious and addictive, as warm or meditative lyricism alternates with joyous friskiness. -- <i> NEW YORK TIMES: JAMES R. OESTREICH<\/i>"],"title":"Trio Mediaeval: Folk Songs","brand":"Trio Mediaeval","rank":"43,376 in CDs & Vinyl (","asin":"B000UVRL7O","imageURLHighRes":["https:\/\/images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com\/images\/I\/41rS2TtXkVL.jpg"],"details":{"Audio CD":"(October 16, 2007)","SPARS Code:":"DDD","Number of Discs:":"1","Label:":"ECM","ASIN:":"B000UVRL7O"}}]

[{"category":["CDs & Vinyl","Pop","Easy Listening"],"description":["This 2 CD collection features Dick Haymes's two-year tenure with Capitol in the mid-1950s. Although relatively brief, he produced two of the most eloquent ballad albums ever recorded. This album was compiled and mastered with Musicologist and film historian, Ken Barnes and produced in association with the new book The Life of Dick Haymes: No More Little White Lies, by Ruth Prigozy. Dick Haymes was regarded as a the best of the post-Bing generation and this collection is a fitting tribute to this unforgotten star. Features The More I See You, If I Should Lose You, The Very Thought Of You and many more."],"title":"Complete Capitol Collection","brand":"Dick Haymes","rank":"168,926 in CDs & Vinyl (","asin":"B000GIXE2M","imageURLHighRes":["https:\/\/images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com\/images\/I\/31kTwcgi2kL.jpg"],"details":{"Audio CD":"(September 11, 2006)","Number of Discs:":"2","Label:":"Emd Int'l","ASIN:":"B000GIXE2M"}}]
